interactivity.requirements: 35 Ayane Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Fireworks etc... " Seen " Crazier Things Have Happened " from Ayane Amamiya

progression.synopsis: Sensei 's plan of sneaking Ayane into his house without Ami noticing does not work out, but he rejects an opportunity to pretend that Ayane's presence is some kind of accident. Ayane appreciates that he did not dissociate himself from her to avoid Ami's wrath. Ayane proposes that all three of hang out together, and Ayane and Ami spend the rest of the night fighting over who is allowed to cuddle with Sensei.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.13p1.
